ygData.subject: S'pore UO Server
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi all, EA S pore has formed a S pore UO fan club and in their web page, they mention about a SINGAPORE UO SERVER! Now, if they managed to set-up a local
ygData.messageBody:
Hi all,

EA S'pore has formed a S'pore UO fan club and in their web page, they
mention about a SINGAPORE UO SERVER!

Now, if they managed to set-up a local server, it will mean LAG-FREE
gameplay not just for Singapore players, but also for most Asia-Pacific
region players!

Please contribute your petition by visiting
http://www.ea.com.sg/News/Ultima_Fan_Club_/ultima_fan_club_.html or write
in your supportive letter straight to EA Singapore at uo@...

Whether you play UO or not, pls help to petition for one, as this shld be
the very 1st massive RPG online server setup in S'pore gaming history.

I thank you.


Dark Flame (UO Baja Shard)
Ziltus Planeswalker (EQ Innoruuk Server)

p/s: This is not a fake. The news was announced few days back in Dr
Twister UO site.
